publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-719 Helen Eadie: Date for Removal of Forth Road Bridge Tolls—That the Parliament is gravely concerned that for thousands of drivers heading north into Fife and further destinations queuing for up to two hours has become a fact of life during weekend road works on the Forth Road Bridge; is mindful that, although a Bill is proceeding through the Parliament, no date has been set for removal of the bridge tolls, and expresses deep regret that, despite the SNP having been in government for six months, drivers continue to experience on a weekly basis a situation of longer and longer delays with all the consequences to the social and economic lives of our people.
S3M-719 Date for Removal of Forth Road Bridge Tolls (lodged on 29 October 2007) John Park*
